### COMPILE ###
DKSETPATH(${OPENCV}/${OS})
WIN32_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G ${GENERATOR} -A Win32 "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=/DTEST /DWIN32 /D_WINDOWS /W3 /nologo" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG=/MTd /Od /Ob0 /Zi /RTC1 /DDEBUG /D_DEBUG" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE=/MT /O2 /Ob2 /DNDEBUG" -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=OFF ${OPENCV})
WIN32_VS_DEBUG(opencv-3.4.1 OpenCV.sln)
WIN32_VS_RELEASE(opencv-3.4.1 OpenCV.sln)

DKSETPATH(${OPENCV}/${OS})
WIN64_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G ${GENERATOR} -A x64 "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=/DWIN32 /D_WINDOWS /W3 /nologo" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG=/MTd /Od /Ob0 /Zi /RTC1 /DDEBUG /D_DEBUG" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE=/MT /O2 /Ob2 /DNDEBUG" -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=OFF ${OPENCV})
WIN64_VS_DEBUG(opencv-3.4.1 OpenCV.sln)
WIN64_VS_RELEASE(opencv-3.4.1 OpenCV.sln)

DKSETPATH(${OPENCV}/${OS})
MAC64_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Xcode" -DCMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES=x86_64 -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=OFF "-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS=-stdlib=libc++" ${OPENCV})
MAC64_XCODE_DEBUG(opencv-3.4.1 opencv_core)
MAC64_XCODE_RELEASE(opencv-3.4.1 opencv_core)
MAC64_XCODE_DEBUG(opencv-3.4.1 opencv_imgcodecs)
MAC64_XCODE_RELEASE(opencv-3.4.1 opencv_imgcodecs)
MAC64_XCODE_DEBUG(opencv-3.4.1 opencv_videoio)
MAC64_XCODE_RELEASE(opencv-3.4.1 opencv_videoio)

DKSETPATH(${OPENCV}/${OS})
IOS_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Xcode" -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${DKCMAKE}/iOS.cmake -DIOS_PLATFORM=OS -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=OFF ${OPENCV})
IOS_XCODE_DEBUG(opencv-3.4.1 opencv_core)
IOS_XCODE_RELEASE(opencv-3.4.1 opencv_core)
IOS_XCODE_DEBUG(opencv-3.4.1 opencv_imgcodecs)
IOS_XCODE_RELEASE(opencv-3.4.1 opencv_imgcodecs)
IOS_XCODE_DEBUG(opencv-3.4.1 opencv_videoio)
IOS_XCODE_RELEASE(opencv-3.4.1 opencv_videoio)

DKSETPATH(${OPENCV}/${OS})
IOSSIM_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Xcode" -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${DKCMAKE}/iOS.cmake -DIOS_PLATFORM=SIMULATOR64 -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=OFF ${OPENCV})
IOSSIM_XCODE_DEBUG(opencv-3.4.1 opencv_core)
IOSSIM_XCODE_RELEASE(opencv-3.4.1 opencv_core)
IOSSIM_XCODE_DEBUG(opencv-3.4.1 opencv_imgcodecs)
IOSSIM_XCODE_RELEASE(opencv-3.4.1 opencv_imgcodecs)
IOSSIM_XCODE_DEBUG(opencv-3.4.1 opencv_videoio)
IOSSIM_XCODE_RELEASE(opencv-3.4.1 opencv_videoio)

DKSETPATH(${OPENCV}/${OS}/${DEBUG})
LINUX32_DEBUG_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Unix Makefiles" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=DEBUG -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=OFF -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=-fPIC -m32 ${OPENCV})
LINUX32_DEBUG_COMMAND(make opencv_core)
LINUX32_DEBUG_COMMAND(make opencv_imgcodecs)
LINUX32_DEBUG_COMMAND(make opencv_videoio)

DKSETPATH(${OPENCV}/${OS}/${RELEASE})
LINUX32_RELEASE_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Unix Makefiles" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RELEASE -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=OFF -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=-fPIC -m32 ${OPENCV})
LINUX32_RELEASE_COMMAND(make opencv_core)
LINUX32_RELEASE_COMMAND(make opencv_imgcodecs)
LINUX32_RELEASE_COMMAND(make opencv_videoio)

DKSETPATH(${OPENCV}/${OS}/${DEBUG})
LINUX64_DEBUG_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Unix Makefiles" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=DEBUG -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=OFF -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=-fPIC ${OPENCV})
LINUX64_DEBUG_COMMAND(make opencv_core)
LINUX64_DEBUG_COMMAND(make opencv_imgcodecs)
LINUX64_DEBUG_COMMAND(make opencv_videoio)

DKSETPATH(${OPENCV}/${OS}/${RELEASE})
LINUX64_RELEASE_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Unix Makefiles" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RELEASE -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=OFF -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=-fPIC ${OPENCV})
LINUX64_RELEASE_COMMAND(make opencv_core)
LINUX64_RELEASE_COMMAND(make opencv_imgcodecs)
LINUX64_RELEASE_COMMAND(make opencv_videoio)
